hooks.command:
# Prevent editing on main branch
[ "$(git branch --show-current)" != "main" ] || { echo '{"block": true, "message": "Cannot edit files on main branch. Create a feature branch first."}' >&2; exit 2; }

# Auto-format Python files with Ruff
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" =~ \.py$ ]]; then
  cd /home/thein/repos/tta-solo && uv run ruff format "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null && echo '{"feedback": "Formatted with Ruff.", "suppressOutput": true}' || true
fi

# Auto-run tests when test files change
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" =~ test_.*\.py$ ]]; then
  echo '{"feedback": "Running related tests..."}' >&2
  cd /home/thein/repos/tta-solo && uv run pytest "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" -v --tb=short 2>&1 | tail -30
  exit 0
fi
